# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(s::String, text_width::Int=10)
    sp = split(s, " ")
    lines = [""]
    for word in sp
        line = lines[end]
        if length(line) > 0 && length(line)+length(word)+1 > text_width
            push!(lines, word)
        else
            lines[end] = join(line, word, " ")
        end
    end
    return join(lines, "\n")
end
```

```julia
wrap_string("Now is the time for all good men to come to the aid of the party")
```
